column4: hello Ive been having problems trying to install the hp deskjet 3050 j610 because the driver is not found. Anyone has any experience working out this issue_
I just installed the hplip-gui and hplip but cannot get the printer to work. It says that the driver is missing
what Ubuntu version are you on?
you need a slightly newer version of hplip
upgrading to 11.04 or higher would manage it, otherwise you'd have to attempt to use a more recent hplip alone
I tried to upgrade but after updating from the update manager I cannot see the option to do an upgrade. I also tried doing apt-get dist-upgrade but got nothing :(
well that's a problem someone else in the channel will have to help you with
insofar as it would make available to you the hplip version you require
